thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Bridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fresh new hotel, faultless
thread.title_full: Fresh new hotel, faultless - Review of Premier Inn London Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Martin W
title: Fresh new hotel, faultless
text:
Quick check-in using machine but staff member available to assist if required.
Good, spacious fresh new room to the latest style. Usual room extras like TV and tea/coffee making. Air conditioning and double glazing keep any outside noise out.
Latest bathroom fittings means shower only. Towels and soap dispensers provided.
Good breakfast buffet to start the day with.
Location is perfect for attractions in the area such as Shard, Borough Market, South Bank. Underground and National Rail very close by (5-10 mins walk).
This new Inn is a welcome addition to the portfolio in London, I got an early booking low price, but I notice it is becoming very popular and is already sold out some weekends, so book well ahead if you want to stay.
Room Tip: All rooms air conditioned and double glazed. See more room tips
